**The Joyful Pursuit of Rocky Knowledge**

My journey took an exciting turn with the opportunity to explore geology in Puerto Rico. Imagine a classroom where every rock formation is a live textbook on natural history! This experience has enriched my skills and prepared me to share this blend of knowledge and wonder with others, from eager students to seasoned scientists.
